my_agent.title: Math Chat Agent
my_agent.description: A friendly conversational assistant powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash that can perform basic mathematical operations using specialized tools. Perfect for quick calculations and casual conversation.
features: Add and multiply numbers with tool support

sequential_workflow.title: Sequential Research Pipeline
sequential_workflow.description: A three-stage document creation pipeline that expands topics into key points, drafts cohesive paragraphs, and improves writing quality. Each stage builds on the previous one in a linear sequence.

parallel_workflow.title: Parallel Research & Synthesis
parallel_workflow.description: Orchestrates three specialized researchers running concurrently to investigate renewable energy, electric vehicles, and carbon capture using Google Search. Results are synthesized into a comprehensive report.
features: Google Search integration for real-time data

loop_workflow.title: Document Refinement Loop
loop_workflow.description: Creates an initial draft and iteratively improves it through a critic-refiner cycle. The loop continues until the document meets quality standards (up to 5 iterations) with automatic termination when complete.
